website_summaries.verdict: You probably won't wear this beautiful watch every day, but it is an excellent choice for special occasions and black-tie affairs.
pros: We love how this watch grabs attention
Perfect accessory for dressy and formal occasions
Stainless steel gold-tone dial and band and crystal-encrusted face create an elegant, high-end look
Features three subdials and a date window
cons: The fancy looks make this watch less versatile for everyday wear than others on our shortlist

customer_reviews.title: The watch is fake!
customer_reviews.text: I took this watch to an official michael kors store in New York to get fitted as it was too large. They told me it was fake, I spoke to a manager who explained this happens all the time and most of the watches sold on Amazon are fake. I'm so disappointed! Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.author: Juan

customer_reviews.title: & the presentation for this watch was beautiful. Enjoy the pics
customer_reviews.text: OvEy, holy cow, oh my God, WOW!! lol yeah its a conversation starter. It sparkle no mater where you are, it's light in weight, & the presentation for this watch was beautiful. Enjoy the pics.
customer_reviews.author: Street☆ChemistTop Contributor: Watches

customer_reviews.title: It will get the job done...but hopefully it'll last!
customer_reviews.text: TBH...you get what you pay for. I can not tell if it is real or fake. However, if it is fake it's a great replica. The serial number on the tag matches, the stop watch function works, and it feels heavy duty. However, the watch did not come with the authentic brown box or a user's manual. Also, the watch did not come with any extra links. More importantly, it does not say Michael Kors on the back of the face of the watch. After doing some research, these are things that should have been included with an authentic Michael Kors Lexington watch.
customer_reviews.author: armida a moultrie

customer_reviews.title: 100% Genuine Michael Kors watch
customer_reviews.text: I saw this watch at the Las Vegas Michael Kors store and knew I had to have it! I was hesitant buying it on Amazon because I heard about potential fakes. I was able to take a good look at the one in the store and took photos of it. Then I bought the one on Amazon and compared it to the one from the store. They are exactly the same watch. Some people complaining that there's no MK logo on the bottom of the watch, on the silver surface. But the one in the store didn't have it either. They are an exact match. The silver is very bright and flashy. A solid look for any guy or girl.
customer_reviews.author: SuperLuigi

customer_reviews.title: Genuine MK watch for substantially less $$$
customer_reviews.text: Genuine MK watch for substantially less than every other website, including MK's. One great note: I bought it through Amazon and the band was too big for my son, so we brought it into a MK store and they sized it free of charge with no questions asked. They said it is free of charge no matter where you bought it as long as it is a genuine MK watch.
customer_reviews.author: Sheri C.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful timepiece.. came with original paperwork and watch box.. would recommend this watch to anybody.. it is very much authentic.. if you dont have big wrists you will need links taken out which may cost you around $10 to $15.. other than that amazing experience!!
customer_reviews.author: Vincent Anthony

customer_reviews.title: It is a beautiful watch. It looks authentic by all the information ...
customer_reviews.text: It is a beautiful watch. It looks authentic by all the information I got on how to identify a real MK watch. But!! it did not come with the instruction booklet which is in all watches cheap or expensive. There was an insert that states it was associated with Fossil, so that was a plus and I can go on line for the warranty information. (not really) I will check with Michael Kors store.
customer_reviews.author: LilS

customer_reviews.title: This is a good buy, great watch, and even better service.
customer_reviews.text: I loved everything about the delivery, quick turn around time (2 days) from order to the east coast. The watch itself looked stunning, i was disappointed to find the spare links were not in a bag (all 3 already attached to watch) and the MK user guide/booklet was not in the box. But i verified that it was an authentic MK, and after a brief phone call amazon was quick to sort out these issues. I would deffeniately recommend anyone on the fence about this purchase, to do so as you will not regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Honest Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Authentic.
customer_reviews.text: My favorite watch model. Yes it is real and authentic. Very comfortable, sleek, and the perfect addition to any watch enthusiasts collection.
customer_reviews.author: Question man

customer_reviews.title: Works for women also
customer_reviews.text: Love this watch!!! Feels nice around wrist. Great price!! Would Recommend to women also
customer_reviews.author: Mikaela

customer_reviews.title: Favorite watch
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful watch. The size of the watch doesn't look overly too large on my fairly small wrist. Really love the dark blue background. Classy and sophisticated. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Duke&Me

customer_reviews.title: Good Looking Casual Watch
customer_reviews.text: Watch Was Initially Purchased For Casual Use/Wear. Have Owned Watch For Over A Year And So Far Has Served Its Purpose. Watch Is Genuine. Easy To Read. Easy To Adjust Time And Date. Bracelet Is Comfortable And Does Not Pinch Skin. Watch Has Weight To It. Attractive Bracelet And Bezel. Crown Is Branded With MK Initials. Serial Number Located On The Case. Watch Feels And Looks Expensive. Great Looking Watch For The Price. *Recommend
customer_reviews.author: Kapitan

customer_reviews.title: Authentic
customer_reviews.text: I was accused of buying a knock-off by my friend who spent $300 on a similar MK watch. Only thing I'm guilty of is saving 50% on an authentic MK watch (came in the box, with the tags on it and had it verified at MK stores). Oh, and the face glows in the dark which for some reason isn't advertised but is freaking awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Perfect condition. Original MK's box and paperwork
customer_reviews.text: Perfect condition. Original MK's box and paperwork. Great quality. All I had to do was bring it the a jeweler to have links removed to have sized. So I paid 10 bux for that.. Well worth it. Great quality MK watch.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch for my boyfriend as a nice gift for when we got a nice date night and could dress up. It wasn't working when we got it, we assumed it was the battery and didnt get around to taking it in to the jewelers until a couple months later. They wouldn't change the battery because they said there is something else wrong with the watch and wouldn't work anyways. Now I'm stuck with a garbage watch that I can't do anything with and out over 100 bucks. Buyer beware. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Abby Gibson

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY ! It is FAKE There is no serial number on the back nor does it have the Michael kors logo
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's perfect!
customer_reviews.text: After six months of owning this watch it's still looking as great as ever! I love this watch. It looks so good. I've been looking for a black and gold watch like this for a long time. Beautiful watch. High quality. I accidentally got it wet and it still works great... I think it has some water-resistance? Anyway, awesome watch. Fyi... It looks big on my wrist only because I've got smaller wrists.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Buy this watch!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have a few Michael Kors watches that I bought from the actual Michael Kors store. And I can honestly say in my opinion this is a real Michael Kors Watch! I bought this for my man for Valentine’s Day coming up, and I know he is going to 100 percent love it!! The company did a fantastic job of packing this watch! I was more then pleased. Also it estimated that I would not receive it until January 28th but I got it early today! So they get more points for that! With this experience I will definitely order another watch!
customer_reviews.author: 2sweet4u

customer_reviews.title: It's Authentic!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this watch for my husband. Went to Micheal Kors to check authenticity -- it is authentic!!! Had the band adjusted for free!! He loves his watch!!!
customer_reviews.author: CT

customer_reviews.title: Stylish piece at an affordable piece
customer_reviews.text: I love & collect watches. I currently owe 7 MK watches and about 17 watches in total. This Lexington piece is the 3rd Micheal Kors watch I've purchased from Amazon. They're all authentic, come in the brown MK box with the serial number and booklet. I've been complimented on all my pieces and told I have great taste, which is true! Lol!! I'm not giving this 5 stars because the price deceased as soon as I placed my order. Other than that no complaints. FYI if you need your watch sized and I always do you can buy a kit to do it yourself or take it into a MK store and they will do it for you for free!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn From NJ

customer_reviews.title: 100% Real
customer_reviews.text: This is a Authentic watch, you don't have to worry about buying a fake watch. Went to a Jewlery Store and they charged me only 5 Dollars to resize the watch and it fits perfectly know I highly recommend getting this watch it looks amazing in person, Rolex quality :-)
customer_reviews.author: Johnny

customer_reviews.title: Tight Band and Heavy
customer_reviews.text: The watch look nice. But it is heavy. The biggest disappointment is that the band was only average size, and therefore is tight on my wrist. For the price, they should have either provided extra links that could be inserted, or provide a bigger band.
customer_reviews.author: Chicagoan

customer_reviews.title: Stunning watch
customer_reviews.text: Looks expensive! This was an anniversary gift for my husband. He absolutely loved it. He had a few links removed, so its a good option for a bigger man too. The face is very dark blue with the silver band. The numbers and hands light up green in the dark. The date is in the lower right hand corner.
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my boyfriend. His eyes lit up so big when he opened it. He loved it!! It is a very nice watch.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Geracitano

customer_reviews.title: Could it be a knock-off?
customer_reviews.text: So far the watch works well. The gold strap seems a little cheap looking, too bright or something. I know it's not real gold, but it looks strange. I also am bothered that it came with no instruction book or warranty info. This makes me wonder if it's a knock-off watch. We have had to search the web for info for how to operate the functions. Seems strange to me. The box was nice, but I have to wonder....
customer_reviews.author: S. LANGLEY

customer_reviews.title: Luxury at affordable price
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my husband. He likes luxury watches like Breitling (a store we visited in Vegas) which we can never afford. He said he loved the watch, that it was quite similar to the 6 figure watch at the Breitling store. This watch is a great luxury for most of us at a price within reach for many
customer_reviews.author: amy riley

customer_reviews.title: I am so pleased with it
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my boyfriend as an anniversary gift. It got delivered in less than 24hours. I am so pleased with it. It is authentic/real. Very very beautiful, kind of want it for myself lol. Came in Michael Kors box with tag on it.
customer_reviews.author: r.sedano

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch! You will love it.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful watch! Coincidentally, the jewer we took it to so that it would be sized was working on an identical one for another client. Popular watch. Even nice in real life than in pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Isabella

customer_reviews.title: He loved it. It is a large watch and we ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought for grandson's birthday. He loved it. It is a large watch and we had to have several links removed. It did have all the Michael Kors signature and initials in the correct place. It is a beautiful watch.
customer_reviews.author: Clowie L

customer_reviews.title: and based on the pictures it looked great for the price
customer_reviews.text: When I received the watch, I couldn't believe how "cheap" it looked. I have expensive thousand dollar watches, and everything in between. I purchased this to match an outfit, and based on the pictures it looked great for the price. I was wrong. It was too big, looked cheap, and looked nothing like the pictures.
customer_reviews.author: BAS

customer_reviews.title: Great looking watch 100 percent authentic I took it to ...
customer_reviews.text: Great looking watch 100 percent authentic I took it to the Michael kors store in the mall and they confirmed its 100 percent happy I bought Aunthenticity was my only reason I was hesitant
customer_reviews.author: Vernez Duskin

customer_reviews.title: Best Father’s Day gift
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband to match his wedding band and he loves it. Not the wrist band was too loose only by 3 links. We did go and get them removed. My husband is average weight and height so the watch seems to come with the wrist band as big as it could go.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Sleek, Stylish, Practical
customer_reviews.text: Michael Kors makes great watches that's a given, but this one is very practical. Often times we get these really expensive watches and only wear them every so often; however, this one can follow you from your desk to the bar. It's sleek enough to wear with a suit and stylish enough to wear with the clothes you impress the ladies with. Buy it, you won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Jahkai

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Watch Ever!
customer_reviews.text: I get so many compliments on this watch. I love wearing it. Looks much more expensive than it is. The band is also extremely comfortable; and the quick release function makes taking it on and off a breeze. I had my eye on this watch for over a year, and I wish I had just purchased it right away. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Jon Burrito

customer_reviews.title: We both love it. My ONLY complaint is that the blue ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my BF as a birthday gift. We both love it. My ONLY complaint is that the blue background isn't as vibrant as it is pictured here. It's a midnight blue, the blue tones are more visible in the sunlight. Other than that, very classy watch. Great as a starter watch for a guy that may be just starting off a collection.
customer_reviews.author: Alley cat

customer_reviews.title: Boyfriend Loved It
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my boyfriend, and he loved it. Comes quick and in good packaging, and in a 'Michael Kors' box, with instruction manual to change the time. Is super stylish, and I would recommend it. (:
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: A classic timepiece. Gorgeous!
customer_reviews.text: High class watch at a great buy! Love the Lexington watches by Michael Kors. I am female and I wear them as a boyfriend watch. I just take to my local jeweler to get the links removed to fit to my liking. I do appreciate the Michael Kors watch box with pillow so I can safely store it when not wearing. Was available on Amazon Prime for a great price. Did not disappoint. Thank you 😊 Amazon Prime.
customer_reviews.author: Eric D.

customer_reviews.title: Handsome watch.
customer_reviews.text: I am a Michael Kors fan and this watch does not disappoint. It is defiantly a stand out piece. Looks great with a suit or jeans. Defiantly a man's watch.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Classy bling
customer_reviews.text: High quality and will last for years. Runs super big but I was able to take out links. This is a real MK watch!
customer_reviews.author: jenduck

customer_reviews.title: Lumination a bit weak
customer_reviews.text: Received watch as promised. Had band adjusted at local jewelry store that handles MK. No charge to adjust. The dial lamination could be better. I checked it in a room with lights off, looked at dial and could not see numbers or the hands. However, the watch looks great! I still give it a 5 star rating.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Boothman

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: Owned this previously and repurchased after it was stolen and boy am I glad bc it’s so great looking and you can dress up or down
customer_reviews.author: Jeremiah Rios

customer_reviews.title: Nice Elegant professional Looking
customer_reviews.text: Wanted a watch for when I go out on business events and this one is perfect. Not too flashy and has just the right amount of wow. Bezel is a nice medium-large size and not overwhelming. Really happy with the quality and weight of this bad boy.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Van Olphen

customer_reviews.title: Does not feel real
customer_reviews.text: It feels fake honestly. I bought another MK watch and it is heave and sturdy feeling. This one doesn’t feel sturdy or heavy and the links sound like a fake plastic when they move. Will be taking this is in to verify it is real.
customer_reviews.author: Molls Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Excellent and Classy
customer_reviews.text: Great watch. i haven't bought a new watch in years and this was affordable, classy and really is better than expected. My wife loves it. Shipped in great packaging and delivery was earlier than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Wall

customer_reviews.title: Great watch!
customer_reviews.text: I gave this watch as a gift and it is absolutely a great watch. The gold is not over the top. If you are accidentally banging your wrist against things, the face of the watch does not scratch. The face is very detailed as well.
customer_reviews.author: Relle

customer_reviews.title: FAKE
customer_reviews.text: Watch is a fake . Don’t waste your money . Obviously made in China . Feels and looks cheap ! I Returned it immediately after seeing it . Very disappointed that Amazon allows this .
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch that makes a great gift that will last forever!!
customer_reviews.text: What’s not to like about anything with Michael Kors name on it!! My granddaughter and I purchased it for her boyfriend and he was absolutely thrilled. The size is perfect and according to him it does not pull on the arm hairs.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ann Riha

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift!
customer_reviews.text: MY BF LOVED THIS WATCH! Super ice and looks more expensive than it is! My boyfriend has had it for awhile and it still looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra

customer_reviews.title: Amazing buy!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing watch for a amazing price. Way cheaper on amazon and it’s actually real!! I have multiple Michael khors watches and this one matches with all of them. I would definitely recommend to a friend especially for the price you can get it for.
customer_reviews.author: Andres

customer_reviews.title: A Popular Gift
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift to our grandson. He was very pleased and couldn’t believe he received it. Apparently popular with his high school crowd. A little pricey, I thought.
customer_reviews.author: Mert

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous watch and fabulous price!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful watch! I have had the rose gold version of the Lexington watch for several years and it’s no longer keeping accurate time so I wanted to try the two tone. It’s sturdy and gorgeous, band is big so will fit larger wrists but the links are easy to take out at home with the proper tools. Looks much more expensive than it actually is!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Anniversary gift
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my fiancé for our anniversary and he loves it. He’s practically worn it everyday since I have it to him. It looks amazing on him and works as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice watch, but the dial is darker than advertised
customer_reviews.text: I love anything Michael Kors. I purchased this watch for my Cowboys fan due to the dial being blue. The watch is very nice; however, the blue is not nearly as bright. It's more of a midnight blue so I was a bit bummed about that. If you're not stuck on the blue that's advertised, the watch is very nice and a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: C. M. Mckenney

customer_reviews.title: Add to your collection!
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch! Amazing look/style and size. I recommend this watch to anyone who appreciates a nice watch.
customer_reviews.author: Nicolas Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Top quality, head turner for sure.
customer_reviews.text: Love this watch,looked at so many its rediculous before buying this. I wear two diamound rings, my 30yr and my wedding ring and my gold band. I wanted a watch that was not cheap yet not over the top. Perfect yet be aware it is big.
customer_reviews.author: Sneaky Pete

customer_reviews.title: beautiful watch at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful watch. I lost my last watch and needed an adequate replacement that catches the eye but doesnt break the bank. This one exceeded my needs. I had to take some links off that cost me 27$ in a NYC jewellery store. I wpild recommend resizing it yourself by watching a youtube video (very easy) or simply find a cheaper store.
customer_reviews.author: Young Donnie T

customer_reviews.title: Love It!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This watch definitely has the WOW factor. My bf is going to love this as a bday present. Was shipped fast and is exactly as pictured
customer_reviews.author: GermanGoodie

customer_reviews.title: Great first time father gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband and got it engraved for the birth of our first son, and gave it to him on the day of my delivery. He loves it and will treasure it forever. Negatives: the blue is not as bright and vivid as shown in the picture. It is more of a dark midnight blue, Almost black, and it is hard to tell it is even blue unless we are in the sunlight
customer_reviews.author: Smatos

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this watch. I am so glad I brought it for him.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased customer
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch Friday night and received it Monday afternoon....everything was right,the watch,box and booklet, I will probably but buy another. Very pleased customer
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My favorite watch
customer_reviews.text: I love the Michael Kors collection of men’s watches. This is my favorite watch by far. I’m going to get the black one next.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: Nice Michael Kors Watch
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my boyfriend for Sweetest Day and he is in love with it, watch came superb and flawless, took it to Michael Kors store and they sized it, lady even asked me....... you bought this watch last week and I surely did. Authentic and stunning, he wears it whenever we go out or to special events, sometimes running errands! deft would recommend this watch.
customer_reviews.author: Ciara B.

customer_reviews.title: valuable
customer_reviews.text: It was alittle expensive. I look on ebay and theirs are cheaper. But didn’t return it it was really amazing the diamond are really stunning 👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: patricia

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended for Everyday Use.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Best watch in my inexpensive collection line. Perfect timekeeper. Looks good. Looks Professional. Nice accent to many professional and casual outfits. Highly recommended. Oh and did I tell you, I got the women's version for my wife and she loves hers too...Awesom!
customer_reviews.author: C.A. McG

customer_reviews.title: Water proof is important
customer_reviews.text: Condensation in dial, cannot Get a hold of customer service for replacement
customer_reviews.author: Arthur Middleton

customer_reviews.title: Stunning watch
customer_reviews.text: Husband loves it and it looks like a million bucks on his wrist.
customer_reviews.author: Norine Siple

customer_reviews.title: MK Men's watch
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch for my 14 year old son for his graduation and he loves it. The contrast of color between the face & band is quite attractive. He should be able to wear this watch for many years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew D.

customer_reviews.title: What a stunning watch!
customer_reviews.text: Looks like a 4k dollar watch. The crystals shimmer like diamonds. Michael Kors did it again. Love his watches. And thanks to Amazon because it was the best price online for this watch.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Gift for a Man
customer_reviews.text: It is REAL, 1st off. Beautiful, legitimate, packaged safely, and most of all, i loved the Michael Kors box it came in and everything. Watch is so clean it shines like a rainbow in the light and the diamonds/crystals reflect rainbow streaks when the sun hits it. He ONLY wears it to go out he absolutely loved it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Clarisol

customer_reviews.title: My man loved it
customer_reviews.text: Boyfriend loved his gift an the watch Just needs to be size a little to big but he loved it which makes me happy so definitely a good buy for bday gifts etc.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsey

customer_reviews.title: Great watch
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my boyfriend and it goes perfect with all his outfits looks way more expensive and its water proof hes been in the water with it multiple times and nothing has happened to the watch
customer_reviews.author: Alizely

customer_reviews.title: Classy look
customer_reviews.text: Bought this watch for my husband, he is extremely happy and wears it daily, wonderfully price I paid here 206$!!!
customer_reviews.author: Shana M

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This watch has the class of excellence. Worth every penny of the value.
customer_reviews.author: David N

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my fiance and he absolutely loves it. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cant beat it!!
customer_reviews.text: This watch is Awesome!! Nice weight to it, classy, and honestly...to me this watch looks better than a Rolex! Very elegant
customer_reviews.author: Edward C Kulcsar

customer_reviews.title: Great Wedding Present
customer_reviews.text: Gifted this watch in a wooden/glass watch case (that I also bought off here) and he LOVED IT! It made the perfect wedding present. The Watch looks expensive and of quality. Would 10/10 buy again, and suggest this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Benfield

customer_reviews.title: Boyfriend loved it. Looks exactly as it appears in picture
customer_reviews.text: Boyfriend loved it. Looks exactly as it appears in picture. I've found that most MK watches (mens and womens) come as a standard size and theyre usually rather large. I personally don't mind having linmks removed but if you're looking for a good fit as is then MK is not the way to go.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Raschello-Stankes

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality watch
customer_reviews.text: Bought this 2018. Still ticking hasnt turned color.... everyone compliments my bf when he wears it. Money well spent
customer_reviews.author: _BelgiumChocol8

customer_reviews.title: Husband loves
customer_reviews.text: Classy looking watch for every day use. Bought for my husband for Father's Day and so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 5 Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great watch, just a tad bit bigger then my personal taste but I still really like it!!
customer_reviews.author: LG

customer_reviews.title: Classy Watch
customer_reviews.text: I love how the watch fits, feels and looks on my wrist! It so far has kept excellent time!
customer_reviews.author: David W Parham

customer_reviews.title: Trash don’t waste your time
customer_reviews.text: This item is trash I would rate it a zero if possible. Original purchase stopped working and center knob fell completely off after wearing a couple of times. The replacement watch has done the exact same thing only after wearing only once. I would not recommend purchasing this item.
customer_reviews.author: MER

customer_reviews.title: Good looking watch
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good looking watch. The only thing I didn’t like is the band seems cheap. I have another mk watch in a different style and the band is much heavier. I don’t know if it’s just the style of the watch or a fake band but either way you can’t beat the price and the watch itself definitely seems real mk.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Watch
customer_reviews.text: This watch is even nicer in person. My husband is a big man and has really big arms and wrists and this watch fits him perfectly. The size of the face and the thickness of the band is great for a large man. The watch is beautiful and well made. I love MK products but this is the first time buying jewelry and it looks like I will be buying some more.
customer_reviews.author: pinkmafiagrl

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Everyday wear. Looks nice and simple yet elegant. Holds up to a beating if you are wearing it at work. I've purchased the all Gold and the two tone. Definitely Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Matt G

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! This is my second one. I bought the women's 5 years ago, then bought the men's recently and had it sized. I'm tall and like the look of a mans watch. I get compliments on this watch all the time.
customer_reviews.author: denice

customer_reviews.title: Not authentic
customer_reviews.text: Very unhappy about this watch or the watch i got today. The watch was not real, the back of the watch didnt have the micheal kors on the back of the watch . It didnt come with extra links . No warranty card. No user manual. Also it didnt come in the box as shown in the pictures . Got it today and returning today
customer_reviews.author: Ralph Sula

customer_reviews.title: I get a ton of compliments on this watch. ...
customer_reviews.text: I get a ton of compliments on this watch. Definitely want to have it sized on the tighter side, otherwise you are looking at some bruising on your wrist due to the size of the watch. It is stunning and well worth the price tag.
customer_reviews.author: Neemz

customer_reviews.title: It is in perfect condition, packaged perfectly
customer_reviews.text: This watch was purchased as a gift a few days before Christmas. I received it way before the promised date. I was hesitant to purchase such an item without seeing it, but it exceeds my expectation. It is in perfect condition, packaged perfectly, love it and so did the gift receiver. I would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: Great for a Gift!
customer_reviews.text: This watch is stunning. I will be gifting it to my son for his birthday. I'm sure he will love it. It's got some weight to it which makes it feel substantial. The face of the watch is quite attractive.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Amazing purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Great buy for the price! All tags on watch and MK box. I love it! Will be gifting it for sure!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too expensive
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product, but it was too expensive to be a small face watch. The style was unmatched though. Unfortunately too small for my taste though.
customer_reviews.author: swinginken

customer_reviews.title: Nice MK watch for men
customer_reviews.text: Great looking watch I was afraid it would look cheap or like a nock off but it's a nice watch. Face is big though.
customer_reviews.author: frequent shopper

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: One great looking watch that is well made and people notice it right away.
customer_reviews.author: DiDi

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful watch. My husband was so happy with this gift. Very nice. As described. Nice price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice watch
customer_reviews.text: This watch is really nice and It is authentic. The band however will come big so you will have to take out a few links for a perfect fit. This can be done at any watch store.
customer_reviews.author: Prima2323

customer_reviews.title: Watch
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift and turned out perfect. Looks just like it is shown. Just a little big for The wrist.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Darden

customer_reviews.title: This watch is beautiful. I've always had a thing for fashion watches
customer_reviews.text: This watch is beautiful. I've always had a thing for fashion watches, but never really had the money to just go out and get one for the sake of doing so. I saved up for this one & purchased it about a month ago & have to say it's gorgeous. The fit is great, and the navy face really looks pleasant.
customer_reviews.author: Sam M.

customer_reviews.title: Class is Michael Kors' watch!
customer_reviews.text: This elegant,beautiful Men's watch was a gift. I think my bf will love it!
customer_reviews.author: HoneyJackson

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and loving it.
customer_reviews.text: It is quite a nice design. The chain looks very elegant. I would say , the chain looks identical to Rolex Aquamarine model. The watch itself is nicely built . Not too bulky nor slim. A perfect all event wristwear. Absolutely a yes from me.
customer_reviews.author: Shafiul Azim

product_meta.title: Michael Kors Lexington Chronograph Stainless Steel Watch
product_meta.description:
* Watch Sizing Guide
 * Embrace the signature style of sophistication and class with the MK8344 - Lexington watch by Michael Kors Collection™.
 * Two-tone golden and silver color stainless steel.
 * Three-hand movement.
 * White dial with gold accents, stopwatch function, date window.
 * Fold over buckle clasp.
 * Beveled top ring.
 * Dial face includes hour markers and brand name.
 * Dial ring features split-second track.
 * Water resistant 10 ATM/100 meters.
 * Imported.
 * Measurements:  *  Case Height: 44 mm
    *  Case Width: 44 mm
    *  Case Depth: 12 mm
    *  Band Width: 22 2⁄9 mm
    *  Band Circumference/Length: 9 1⁄2 in
    *  Weight: 6 oz
